00037 URef< GrSoftwareTexture >       
00038 GrSoftwareTextureMgr::GetTexture( const UPath& filePath )
00039 {
00041     TextureContainer::iterator it = _textures.find( filePath );
00042 
00044     if ( it != _textures.end() )
00045         return it->second;
00046 
00048         URef< RFile > file = gRFileMgr->GetFile( filePath, RFileMgr::kFlagRead );
00049         if ( !file )
00050                 return false;
00051 
00052         const void *fileData = file->GetData();
00053         unsigned int fileSize = ( unsigned int )file->GetSize();
00054 
00056         GrImage* image = new GrImage( filePath, UReader( fileData, fileSize, false ) );
00057 
00059         file->Purge();
00060 
00062     URef< GrSoftwareTexture > texture( new GrSoftwareTexture( image ) );
00063     _textures.insert( std::make_pair( filePath, texture ) );
00064 
00066     return texture;
00067 }
00068 
00069 //----------------------------------------------------------
00070 URef< GrSoftwareTexture >       
00071 GrSoftwareTextureMgr::FindTexture( const UPath& filePath )
00072 {
00074     TextureContainer::iterator it = _textures.find( filePath );
00075 
00077     if ( it != _textures.end() )
00078         return it->second;
00079 
00081     return 0;
00082 }
